snippet: Mike Stanton is listed as Giancarlo on the Miami roster, on his paycheck and above his locker.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Mike Stanton, precocious slugger for the Miami Marlins, is now listed by his actual first name, Giancarlo, on the team's roster, on his paycheck, and above his locker; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mike Stanton is listed as Giancarlo on the Miami roster, on his paycheck and above his locker.

headline.seo: Marlins’ Mike Stanton Prefers to Be Called Giancarlo
headline.main: Stanton Says Mike Is O.K. But Call Me Giancarlo
headline.print_headline: Stanton Says Mike Is O.K. But Call Me Giancarlo
